name: Tiramisu
description: A sweet creamy dessert, also known as a Tuscan trifle. This dessert consists of ladyfingers that are sprinkled with coffee or espresso and then covered with a mixture consisting of mascarpone cheese.

name: Lemon Cake
description: Two layers of moist lemon-flavored cake coated in a rich lemon-flavored cream cheese frosting.

name: Strawberry Shortcake
description: A tender vanilla cake filled with layers of whipped cream frosting and juicy strawberries.

name: Apple Pie
description: Juicy apple slices are coated in sugar and spices and then baked to perfection inside a flaky homemade pie crust.

name: Molten Lava Cake
description: A warm, gooey cake made with a rich chocolate center that flows out as you cut into it. Served with a scoop of ice cream or a dusting of powdered sugar for an extra touch of indulgence.

name: Red Velvet Cake
description: Red velvet cake is a delicious cake often covered with sweet cream cheese frosting. The name “Red Velvet” is a reflection of its characteristic deep red or burgundy color and its smooth texture.

name: Cheesecake
description: A dessert consisting of a thick, creamy filling of cheese, eggs, and sugar over a thinner crust and topped with sweet or sometimes salty items.

name: Birthday Cake Cookie
description: A birthday cake flavor cookie that is chewy, buttery, and filled with white chocolate chips and sprinkles.

name: Cookies & Cream Cupcake
description: Moist chocolate cupcakes swirled with cookies and cream buttercream frosting, drizzled with chocolate ganache, and crowned with mini Oreo cookies!
